title: Redfern
abstract: Redfern, one railway station away from Sydney Central Station, is a meeting place for Aboriginal people all over Australia. Originating from different tribes, languages, cultures and dreamings, Aboriginality keeps them together as a community in the Big Smoke, Sydney. Rhonda, Chris, Gordon and Shane share their stories of individual urban Aboriginals.
credits: Directed, edited and produced by Trang Nguyen
Photography by Tania Lambert & Krista Weber
festivals: Rencontres Henri Langlois, section Docs dâ€™Europe 2012
